00026 CPDeleteKeyCode     = 8;
00027 CPTabKeyCode        = 9;
00028 CPReturnKeyCode     = 13;
00029 CPEscapeKeyCode     = 27;
00030 CPSpaceKeyCode      = 32;
00031 CPLeftArrowKeyCode  = 37;
00032 CPUpArrowKeyCode    = 38;
00033 CPRightArrowKeyCode = 39;
00034 CPDownArrowKeyCode  = 40;

00081 - (void)setNextResponder:(CPResponder)aResponder

00089 - (CPResponder)nextResponder

00093 
00098 - (void)interpretKeyEvents:(CPArray)events
00099 {
00100     var index = 0,
00101         count = [events count];
00102 
00103     for (; index < count; ++index)
00104     {
00105         var event = events[index];
00106 
00107         switch([event keyCode])
00108         {
00109             case CPLeftArrowKeyCode:    [self doCommandBySelector:@selector(moveLeft:)];
00110                                         break;
00111             case CPRightArrowKeyCode:   [self doCommandBySelector:@selector(moveRight:)];
00112                                         break;
00113             case CPUpArrowKeyCode:      [self doCommandBySelector:@selector(moveUp:)];
00114                                         break;
00115             case CPDownArrowKeyCode:    [self doCommandBySelector:@selector(moveDown:)];
00116                                         break;
00117             case CPDeleteKeyCode:       [self doCommandBySelector:@selector(deleteBackward:)];
00118                                         break;
00119             case CPReturnKeyCode:
00120             case 3:                     [self doCommandBySelector:@selector(insertLineBreak:)];
00121                                         break;
00122             
00123             case CPEscapeKeyCode:       [self doCommandBySelector:@selector(cancel:)];
00124                                         break;
00125 
00126             case CPTabKeyCode:          var shift = [event modifierFlags] & CPShiftKeyMask;
00127 
00128                                         if (!shift)
00129                                             [self doCommandBySelector:@selector(insertTab:)];
00130                                         else
00131                                             [self doCommandBySelector:@selector(insertBackTab:)];
00132 
00133                                         break;
00134 
00135             default:                    [self insertText:[event characters]];
00136         }
00137     }
00138 }
00139 
00144 - (void)mouseDown:(CPEvent)anEvent
00145 {
00146     [_nextResponder performSelector:_cmd withObject:anEvent];

00229 // Action Methods
00234 - (void)insertLineBreak:(id)aSender
00235 {
00236     [self insertNewline:aSender];

00243 - (void)insertNewline:(id)aSender
00244 {
00245     [[self nextResponder] insertNewline:aSender];

00268 // Dispatch methods
00274 - (void)doCommandBySelector:(SEL)aSelector
00275 {
00276     if ([self respondsToSelector:aSelector])
00277         [self performSelector:aSelector];
00278     else
00279         [_nextResponder doCommandBySelector:aSelector];
00280 }
00281 
00289 - (BOOL)tryToPerform:(SEL)aSelector with:(id)anObject
00290 {
00291     if([self respondsToSelector:aSelector])
00292     {
00293         [self performSelector:aSelector withObject:anObject];
00294         
00295         return YES;
00296     }
00297 
00298     return [_nextResponder tryToPerform:aSelector with:anObject];
00299 }

00313 // Getting the Undo Manager
00317 - (CPUndoManager)undoManager
00318 {
00319     return [_nextResponder performSelector:_cmd];
00320 }

00333 var CPResponderNextResponderKey = @"CPResponderNextResponderKey";
00334 
00335 @implementation CPResponder (CPCoding)
00336 
00342 - (id)initWithCoder:(CPCoder)aCoder
00343 {
00344     self = [super init];
00345     
00346     if (self)
00347         _nextResponder = [aCoder decodeObjectForKey:CPResponderNextResponderKey];
00348     
00349     return self;
00350 }
00351 
00356 - (void)encodeWithCoder:(CPCoder)aCoder
00357 {
00358     // This will come out nil on the other side with decodeObjectForKey:
00359     if (_nextResponder !== nil)
00360         [aCoder encodeConditionalObject:_nextResponder forKey:CPResponderNextResponderKey];
00361 }
00362 
00363 @end
